charaepi_ch0351_00_shione/2301_1101_0100:
Blossom was gazing through a shop window
with Kirlia when they were spotted by
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0351_00_shione/2301_1101_0200:
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="He" F="She" ] called out to Blossom, who answered
cheerfully.
charaepi_ch0351_00_shione/2301_1201_0300:
Whenever I have time, I like to walk to town
like this.
charaepi_ch0351_00_shione/2301_1201_0400: I like looking at the dolls and plushies on display.
charaepi_ch0351_00_shione/2301_1201_0500:
It helps me with my clothing and accessory
designs.
charaepi_ch0351_00_shione/2301_1201_0600:
By researching doll outfits AND full-size ones,
I get more ideas.
charaepi_ch0351_00_shione/2301_1201_0700:
I’m still in the research stage, but someday, I hope
to design an outfit that’s as cute as a doll.
charaepi_ch0351_00_shione/2301_1201_0900: Don’t we just look like dolls?
charaepi_ch0351_00_shione/2301_0401_1100:
Hee hee, thank you! I can’t think of a better
compliment!
charaepi_ch0351_00_shione/2301_1201_1400:
But we shouldn’t actually be doll-like when we
wear cute clothes.
charaepi_ch0351_00_shione/2301_1201_1500: Dolls have an unchanging cuteness to them...
charaepi_ch0351_00_shione/2301_1201_1600:
But there’s a cuteness and charm unique to the
living!
charaepi_ch0351_00_shione/2301_1201_1700:
And clothes are more charming when their
wearers are filled with thoughts and emotions.
charaepi_ch0351_00_shione/2301_1201_1900:
Kirlia are influenced by their Trainers’ positive
emotions, which make them sparkle and grow up
even more beautiful.
charaepi_ch0351_00_shione/2301_1201_2000:
Whether I can make the clothes I wear truly
shine—and Kirlia, too!—is up to me.
charaepi_ch0351_00_shione/2301_1201_2100: So even as I try to act calm and refined...
charaepi_ch0351_00_shione/2301_1201_2200: I also make sure I’m brimming with emotions!
charaepi_ch0351_00_shione/2301_1201_2300:
Feelings—from happiness to anger—are what
make both people and Pokémon cute!
